markdownRemark.html:
Spartacus thought Crixus was an easy opponent. Far from it. I like how they showed Crixusâ€™ hard work, it paid off. It is indeed the Champion of Capua.

You could see how raising the fingers broke Spartacusâ€™ spirit. Yet Iâ€™m not sure why letting him live? If they give the 2 fingers are exempt of execution? ðŸ‘Ž
